metadata.title: CVE-2021-35937 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition vulnerability was found in rpm. A local unprivileged usercould use this flaw to bypass the checks that were introduced in responseto CVE-2017-7500 and CVE-2017-7501, potentially gaining root privileges.The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality andintegrity as well as system availability.

criterions.comment: rpm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
